bug.author: monchier
bug.summary: st.code("") raises an exception in the browser
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Error thrown when using st.code with an empty string. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
What are the steps we should take to reproduce the bug:
Run a script with a st.code statement like this:
<denchmark-code>st.code("") </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
no error <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
An exception stack trace is shown in the browser <denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
not sure <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
On Chrome 77.0.3865.75 and develop:b6734272dbc22cad24520be190d0554921d46e2a MacOs 10.4.6
